episodes.title: Series 1: 2. The Origins
episodes.description: The sect’s origins and mysticism are uncovered, profiles of the guru leaders and their financial misconduct emerge. Murder allegations arise, but the cult defends its secrets.

episodes.title: Series 1: 1. Massacre or Suicide
episodes.description: Corpses found at a Swiss farm lead police and reporters to investigate a mystic cult. More ritualistic murders in Canada expand the enquiry, and former cult members speak out.

episodes.title: Series 1: Episode 3
episodes.description: Sixteen charred bodies found in French woodland shock the public, and a French lawsuit opens. New photos of cult rituals damn a flamboyant former cult member, making him prime suspect.

episodes.title: Sirius: An Apocalyptic Order - Series 1: Episode 4
episodes.description: Three children survive a final suicide ritual, and their accounts fuel theories at a fraught public trial. Families of victims mourn, and journalists conclude that the cult may still exist.
